website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural baby wash that does its job without causing reactions or drying out your baby's skin.
cons: Doesn't last as long as some of the other products listed here

website_summaries.verdict: This premium offering from Europe’s leading skincare brand is 100% natural and leaves skin and hair silky soft. Wonderful for very dry skin.
pros: Contains powerful natural ingredients in a milky formula that's designed to actively protect delicate skin
Suitable for newborns and sensitive skin
Enriched with calendula and chamomile to soothe and calm
Creamy and luxurious, with a beautiful natural scent
cons: Moisture protection barrier may leave a bit of a residue

website_summaries.verdict: A natural baby shampoo that works well for babies with sensitive skin or skin conditions.
cons: Doesn't lather as well as some of the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST natural shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shampoo. I’m a natural momma and I’ve tried bronners, babo, Shea moisture, California baby, some indie brands and this is THE best. I even found it’s the best shampoo that I’ve found for my thin, easily greasy hair! It smells great, is a lovely cream that suds up nicely but it doesn’t strip hair at ALL. It makes it shiny, full, and clean. My thin hair, and my toddlers, look so great my husband even mentioned it after the first use. We also love the cream bath! Great for my reactive son and his rosacea, dermatitis, eczema, and cradle cap.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Love the shampoo and ingredients on it
customer_reviews.text: I weleda products for my baby because they don’t have too many chemicals. The 2in1 shampo and body wash is great It serves, my baby ends up clean and smelling nice. It doesn’t make as many sudds as other brands, but this is because it doesn’t have the chemical that makes sudds. Also, the smell it’s nice but you can’t compare it the jj shampo. Anyways, I love this product and everything wedela. I use their hand cream and diaper cream and other products. It is expensive but I buy it because I like to know what’s on my products and I don’t like chemicals or bad products in my body or my babys.
customer_reviews.author: danit green

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: While pregnant I have done an extensive research looking for the least harmful and most natural product for my baby and made my choice going with this one. Never regretted so far. Very pleasant smell and not too strong. No irritation for the eyes or skin. No taste if some bubles are accidentally swalowed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gave me dandruff.
customer_reviews.text: So I read that I could use this if I had a sensitive scalp.... But it ended up giving me a really irritated scalp with dandruff. Not so sure I'll be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aumray

customer_reviews.title: Use as adult shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have very delicate, fine hair & this gentle shampoo washes perfectly. It does not irritate my eyes. Note, it does not suds & takes a little getting use to it. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Connie, California USA

customer_reviews.title: Mild to be used everyday, a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Very mild for baby skin and with very mild odor as well. A little goes a long way. We bathe my baby with this everyday and it's never given her allergies. Skin gets very soft too, and hair looks great. High quality product by Welleda, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the diaper cream and loved the smell and how it worked so I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the diaper cream and loved the smell and how it worked so I tried this. Honestly I am not a fan. It smells different and almost has a chemical smell, like paint. The feel is nice but it's hard to get past the smell. I'll continue to purchase the diaper cream but won't be buying the shampoo/body wash again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Caused my 3month old baby's scalp to become reddish disk itchy hives! Poor baby couldn't soo scratching her head after breaking her with this shampoo. Tool over 3 days to clear out and stop irritation. Worst part they wouldn't let me Return this product for a refund. Don't Try this shampoo, it is not gentle.
customer_reviews.author: SmileTina

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but the scent is too strong
customer_reviews.text: I did like the product itself. I decided to buy it because my baby had cradle cap and I read that Weleda is effective. After about a month of use I agree that it did its job. The reason however I won’t be using again, at least for now and the reason for 4 stars is the scent. It is so strong. If it were scent free I would happily purchase again. If you don’t mind a highly scented product for your baby I would recommend this to you.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Critic

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: Favorite infant shampoo! This is the only product I trust to use on my child. Very gentle with a light scent.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Product
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has done wonders for my baby's cradle cap. It very gentle and doesn't dry out his skin. The scent is very earthy and basically smells like plants which I really like, but might not be for you if you're looking for a heavy scented product. I have very thin hair (and a lot of postpartum shedding) so I actually use it as shampoo myself and I love it. It gives my hair a lot of volume. .
customer_reviews.author: SpaltSh

customer_reviews.title: Smelled different the second time I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. It lathers so well, you only need a little bit and it goes a long way. I bought this product twice because I loved it so much the first time BUT when I received the second order it smelled different then the first bottle I ordered. Not sure if it’s just me or what but it definitely smells different. All in all it’s a great product, just wish it would smell like my first bottle did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Adults too that have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: You just need small dabs & they go a long way! I use a pea size amount for my face. So smooth & silky & my face looks beautiful & clean afterwards. NO BREAKOUTS! I read about this product in a magazine saying that even though it says its for babies, its great for adults. THEY WERE RIGHT! I only buy Weleda products now!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful which is abnormal
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. I've been purchasing this for a year now from Amazon for my baby and usually love it. This time it came and spelled terrible. Spells stale and disgusting. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Winston

customer_reviews.title: ... reads extra gentle on the eye but even being super careful about not going to his eyes but the ...
customer_reviews.text: It reads extra gentle on the eye but even being super careful about not going to his eyes but the little some times goes it's enough to make his eyes super red.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Paz-Luukkonen

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shampoo but ran out so quick it smelled amazing my son has eczema and almost everything makes him break out but not this
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and body wash. My 18 month old has sensitive skin and this doesn't cause any kind of reaction and leaves the skin and hair very soft. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: R.B

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for sensitive skin and babies
customer_reviews.text: We first bought this when I was expecting my first child 6 years ago. I used it first on myself as I have sensitive skin (as a shampoo and body wash) and it was great. We have been using it ever since then, and now also on our new baby.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Smells like an orange dream sickle! No harmful ingredients
customer_reviews.text: It took me so long to find a baby shampoo and body wash that I love! I wanted one without harmful ingredients that also smelled great and worked well. I will never go back from this and have subscribed to it. It smells like an orange dream sickle!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Best baby bodywash
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the BEST for babies. I honestly don’t use anything else for my babies. Helps with all sorts of skin sensitivities. Super moisturizing. No chemicals, phalates or perfumes.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this went bad but it smells terrible. Went straight into the trash as I wasn’t able to return. What a waste!! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Elson

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and healing! Big fan.
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet babes skin didn’t like another supposedly sensitive-skin brand (Aveeno) and I wasn’t about to use Johnson and Johnson (check out their lawsuits for lying about carcinogenic ingredients... just no thanks). This took away his newborn rash completely and healed his lil heat rash. Lathers well and doesn’t cover up that sweet newborn smell. I’m a big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: No harmful chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I love that there aren’t any harmful chemicals in this. It smells well and lathers really well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Late, late, late!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good, I have actually try it before but the shipping took 3 weeks to arrive. I hope they can address the issue so that I can keep ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: MariG

customer_reviews.title: No bad ingredient at all.
customer_reviews.text: Best for kids sensitive skin. Have used this since they were born. No bad ingredient at all.
customer_reviews.author: anonyme

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product scent isn't overwhelming and leaves your baby skin smooth. My child has very sensitive skin and alot of the sensitivity products still irritates him but not this one. Will I recommend this yes to everyone I know. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kim jong h

customer_reviews.title: No tears
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't make my kid cry when washing his hairs. It smells nice and not strong.
customer_reviews.author: sf

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best things that can ever happen to a mom. I initially got this and the diaper cream when i had my first son 8 years ago, and been using it since. My son has mild winter exsima and this keeps it at bay. Plus his hair looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My go-to product for my babies.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing shampoo and body wash! i have used it for 5 years now! We do the subscribe and save. We even keep a bottle at both grand parents houses! it’s very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: My kid has used this product for 10yrs now :)
customer_reviews.text: Just a great product for kids of all ages (-I sometimes use it too). Very gentle, no issues, and gets the job done! We're all very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Love this baby wash and shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this German baby brand. I buy their diaper rash which is amazing. A little of this wash goes a long way. Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: The Blonde and Co

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite shampoo/body wash!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that I use on my baby. It's all natural, very gentle on the skin, and naturally and lightly scented with calendula. My daughter has very sensitive skin, and this press worked well for us!
customer_reviews.author: Mel M.

customer_reviews.title: Love Weleda
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Weleda products. Recommended by our pediatrician and we'll never use anything else. Smells great, applies nicely and our baby's skin is soft, and clear!
customer_reviews.author: MJ Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and body wash for my baby and toddler! I feel great using it and don't worry at all if some soapy water gets in their eyes or they accidentally drink some. Not to mention it actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Pines

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Newborns & Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research on baby body wash/shampoo & this came out on top. It didn’t disappoint! I’ve been using this on my baby since birth through now 2.5 years and have had zero issues! My baby has sensitive skin and this was perfect with zero irritation, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AARW

customer_reviews.title: Super gentle
customer_reviews.text: I love Weleda products. This baby wash leaves our girl clean but not dried out. It never hurts her eyes, and it washes her hair without needing conditioner afterward. The scent is mild and lovely. And I completely trust Weleda's high quality biodynamic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Martel

customer_reviews.title: Weleda sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE WELEDA! They use no alcohol unlike aveeno and johnson
customer_reviews.author: cora

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is very strong for a baby wash. It also says “gentle on eyes” so not tear free. It lathers nicely and feels very soft
customer_reviews.author: Cat Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My baby likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my newborn baby. He is 8 weeks old now, we use it almost every time when we give him a bath. The scent is a little bit strong but it’s ok. The ingredients list is great for baby’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria SN

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is great for hair, face, and body, both for adults and children. The scent is subtle and wonderful. It does not dry out the skin and cleans hair amazingly well without being drying. Good ingredients. Weleda is a brand we trust.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin solution
customer_reviews.text: First baby had great skin, no issues. Second one we struggled with excess dryness, this wash worked almost instantly when combined with the lotion. No rash, no dry skin. Highly recommend for sensitive babies.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on baby skin
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best baby body wash and shampoo ever. It’s so gentle and moisturizing that I felt like it was the safest to use on my tummy throughout my pregnancy as well. My baby seems to love the product and I feel good knowing that it doesn’t have many harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: RoHop

customer_reviews.title: Always loved the brand.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey , because of the super quality, the mildest scent on the market. And very gentle on irritated skin
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought weleda shampoo for my toddler. It’s seems like have a good ingredients, but the hair feel very dry after use. It’s not moisturizing if you are looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Anara

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m allergic to all soaps and this is very gentle and the very faint smell it has is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more toddler eczema
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing. My toddler has very sensitive skin and has not had an eczema breakouts since we have started using this product. I am very happy with it and the ingredients. I will probably keep buying this!
customer_reviews.author: mrsbalderas2017

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love it - and I am an adult!
customer_reviews.text: I got this shampoo for my husband actually - for the days when he showers with his contacts in. We are no babies, but we both love this stuff. Natural, so gentle and leaves your hair feel fantastic. I have colored and treated hair. And this $8 shampoo leaves my hair feeling better, than a $20 aveda one! Love it, love it, love it. I use it as a body wash sometimes too. It smells fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ekat

customer_reviews.title: the only body wash shampoo we ever use for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: have used it since the day he was born, based on a friend's recommendation. no plan to switch any time soon. great product
customer_reviews.author: Yumagic

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in the hopes that I could use ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the hopes that I could use it as an all natural shampoo for myself. Unfortunately, in order to coat my medium length hair, I need to use a lot of product. It would end up being cost prohibitive. I think I'll end up using it as a body wash. But I don't think I'll be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: LMN11

customer_reviews.title: First time mom who swears by this product!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby wash ever! We haven't used it as a shampoo because I use another shampoo for cradle cap, but been using it as a body wash for a year now (my son just turned 1), and we will continue to do so! We also use the calendula oil, the diaper rash cream ( we've never had nappy rash but used it on his back when he had a bout of heat rash and it went away within a day!) and also the body cream for babies! Weleda products are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tolani A.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Gentle on sensitive skin yet effective. We use calendula diaper cream, face cream and body lotion. Happy with them all.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wash
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby shampoo and body washes in one. It is creamy, smooth, and leaves the skin soft. It does not dry the skin out. Two of my babies have skin sensitivities and this has been our answer to helping keep things under control.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after my newborn developed cradle cap and indeed got the job done, his had is all nice and clean and hair very soft. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Drying. I can't think of would be good for a baby's skin or scalp.
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Have always used this for my son
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is expensive but we have never had any issues with rashes or eczema unlike some of the stories we hear from some of the other mothers. Not sure it is entirely this product that is preventing this, but not going to break the karma trying something else. We also use the diaper rash creme that clears up diaper rash as quick as a blink
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for the last three years and for both kids. I even use it myself, on occasion. Soothing, well balanced, not at all drying, with a wonderful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waleda is one of the most natural and high quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Waleda is one of the most natural and high quality products out there. I trust it with my little one’s skin and will continue on doing so
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia

customer_reviews.title: love it, it lasted very long as you only ...
customer_reviews.text: love it, it lasted very long as you only need a small amount. Great product for sensitive baby skin, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Digital_SP

customer_reviews.title: Nice baby wash
customer_reviews.text: I like this baby wash. It's very creamy and keeps my baby's skin soft. I like that this product has natural ingredients. The only thing I would like to see is more of a "baby"smell; the smell of this wash is very light and pleasant but it does not have that distinct baby smell that you might expect. I also don't think this wash lathers as well as others.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Tye

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice but I don't like it. So harsh my kids hair gets dry and tangled. Too strong for kids skin and hsiry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and lather
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo for my two young girls. Don't get it in the eyes though. I love the smell and it lathers up well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product to pack for vacation. A very gentle all in one shampoo and body wash that's free of nasty chemicals. Safe for ALL the family.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rostron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for kids with dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Been using this on my daughter for the last 4 yrs. She has very dry skin and this has been very helpful. Very creamy and gentle on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kav

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works very well with sensitive skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle on sensitive skin. Highly recommend. Great product. Skin feels really fresh and "nourished" after use.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since my baby was born with no issues. I asked the hospital to use this for her first bath. Smells so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie

customer_reviews.title: I'm no baby... but I like it too
customer_reviews.text: This isn't just for babies, I use it on my hair so clean and full of body with softness and shine one of my faves.
customer_reviews.author: jandre

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this, it makes his skin super soft and it's not overly fragrant so it doesn't bother him. Love this product and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rubinson

customer_reviews.title: Best body wash and shampoo for baby's skin out there!
customer_reviews.text: Best body wash and shampoo for baby's skin out there! Weleda has some great products for babies. This body wash is gentle on their skin and smells great. I used it for both my children and have given it to many new parents for their babies.
customer_reviews.author: K. Karr

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this product. The scent is great, the product is creamy and a little goes a long way! We ran out once and had to use a substitute. It was the worst. We will never use another shampoo/body wash on our baby again!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So gentle perfect for our baby boy. Scent is great too
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It's gentle enough to use on her face and has a nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a high and dry climate, (Denver and now Cheyenne) and it's very common for babies to have extra dry skin or even eczema here. I use this for her baths 2-3X per week and it keeps her skin soft with no irritation, flaking or redness. It's gentle enough to use on her face and has a nice smell.
customer_reviews.author: Pai's Mom

customer_reviews.title: non-irritating baby wash
customer_reviews.text: been using this to wash baby since baby was born (more than a year now) and we love it. It doesnt dry out or irritate our baby's skin. Doesnt seem to irritate eyes either when used as a shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: I love this for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I tried two other baby soaps and I think they were making my little one break out in a rash. This one took the rash right away and it smells lovely. I just bought my second bottle and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Skel

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborn
customer_reviews.text: This keeps babies skin vey soft. I haven't needed lotion at all. It smells fresh and very light, nothing strong. I have been using it since my 4 week old was born. He has very sensitive skin and this hasn't caused any irritation at all. I am ordering more to continue using at bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Netjirk

customer_reviews.title: the diaper rash cream for this brand is much better than the shampoo body wash
customer_reviews.text: the diaper rash cream for this brand is much better than the shampoo body wash. besides it being too creamy, it's a nice product
customer_reviews.author: jenz

customer_reviews.title: healthy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my hair. Also use it as a body wash. I love the ingredients. My hair is always shiney and feels healthy. I do not like perfume which makes this ideal because they only use essential oils for their scent and it is very light
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have totally dumped toxic Johnson products and I am never looking back.
customer_reviews.author: JLZ

customer_reviews.title: Effective, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This is our new favorite hair shampoo and body wash!
customer_reviews.author: Ehuanochtli

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skinned babies and pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the price but if your baby has sensitive skin, this stuff is great. The other choice is even pricier so this is the one I stick with and it has such a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Baby Acne
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me from a website for baby acne. Boy! It did not disappoint! It resolved my baby's acne in a matter of 3 days!!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful body wash!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an adult - I have sensitive skin and lots of allergies to SLS and other things found in other body washes. This smells great and does not dry out my skin! Leaves skin so soft! Amazing! Doesn't work great as a shampoo for adults, but is wonderful as a body wash!
customer_reviews.author: Carly S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightly scented, very good for sensitive skin. Overallit's great! !
customer_reviews.text: Loving this on my 8 month old. Has a light scent that smells great. It has not been harsh on his skin and it's very moisturizing. We have gotten it in his eyes and it doesn't burn. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo J.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't help my baby's eczema at all. He continued to flare up.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wash for hair
customer_reviews.text: we use on our son with short hair and its moisturizing enough so we don't need conditioner or lotion after, makes getting him dry & clothed after a bath a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t foam, and it’s makes me want to ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t foam, and it’s makes me want to use more to make sure i clean the whole baby . Other than that no complains , it didn’t irritate and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Olga Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: We love this 2 in 1 body wash and shampoo. It’s all I’ve used on my kids since they were born. It’s great for sensitive skin and smells nice but not to strong. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product line
customer_reviews.text: The baby shampoo and baby oil in this line combine to make the perfect skin care regiment for my babies. They keep diaper rash at bay and my pediatrician complemented them on beautiful skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Mild on the kids' sensitive skin, no eye irritation ...
customer_reviews.text: Mild on the kids' sensitive skin, no eye irritation, neutral odor, rinses clean, seems to have some moisturizing properties. This is our go-to soap for our 4-year-old boy and 18-month-old girl.
customer_reviews.author: inside the granfalloon

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for a kid's dry, flaking scalp.
customer_reviews.text: This took care of my son's dry, peeling scalp in less than a week. Only slightly scented so he doesn't smell like a vase of flowers after use.
customer_reviews.author: H. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great natural shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo because it does not sting my daughter's eyes. She is very allergic to a lot of J&J and other chemical crap. So, this wash makes her skin soft and no allergy. It helps with her eczema too. Highly recommend it if you have a kid with eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzkin

customer_reviews.title: Best for babies
customer_reviews.text: Like all Weleda products high quality and warranty of a natural not toxic soap for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Barencibia

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell of this
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this, and how it leaves my sons skin feeling, but I don't think it's really tear free. I just use it as a body wash for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A.

customer_reviews.title: Weleda is the best
customer_reviews.text: Weleda is the best stuff there is, I love the way this smells and it really helps my lo's cradle cap. We only use a few drops if it per bath. I expect this one bottle to last at least nine months.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice body wash but too much fragrance for my son's skin issues. My older LO is using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Dried my baby’s sensitive skin :( very sad because I was super excited about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana Trachtenberg

customer_reviews.title: No more eczema
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 1 year old because she was having eczema issues in a couple of places. Within 1 week it cleared up! This is a very gentle soap. Was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie a nalty

customer_reviews.title: Love this Weleda it is very gentle for my 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this Weleda it is very gentle for my 3 year old granddaughters hair and skin and it makes bubbles which they love...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Roy

customer_reviews.title: I really love Weleda products
customer_reviews.text: I really love Weleda products. It is a reliable company with great reputation. Soap works great, smells great (light scent), and isn't pack full of chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Maria W

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle. Not soapy like another brand I decided to try. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Gentle On Baby's Skin
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first package of Weleda Baby Shampoo and Body Wash. it's very gentle on my baby's dry winter skin. I've been using it to wash my own face in the shower too. It causes no reaction from my baby when it gets into his eyes. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: jwbarone

product_meta.title: Weleda Baby 2-in-1 Gentle Shampoo and Body Wash, 6.8 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Correct product description: To create a perfectly gentle wash that doesn’t disturb baby skin’s natural balance, we used all of Weleda’s plant knowledge. Formulated with beneficial ingredients like extract of calendula, this serene wash helps to gently lift dirt, leaving skin soft, hair easy to comb and baby’s own scent intact. Sweet almond oil makes baby’s skin feel moisturized, and the soft lather doesn’t sting baby’s eyes. No tears, no tugs, no roughness – just a clean, sweet-smelling, happy baby.
feature_bullets: Contains 1 - 6.8 Ounce 2in1 Gentle Shampoo and Body Wash
Cleanses, cares for skin and moisturizes.
Nurtures skin’s protective layer, makes hair easy to comb and is gentle on eyes.
Free from synthetic preservatives, fragrances, colorants or raw materials derived from mineral oils.
Dermatologically proven very skin-friendly, even on sensitive skin and cradle-cap.
